sentences.en: Also, the Soviets began to nibble at our bait.
sentences.cn: 同时, 苏联人开始表示对我们的主张感兴趣.

sentences.en: Each nibble was eaten with the air of an epicure.
sentences.cn: 每小块食物都吃得津津有味的样子.

sentences.en: He saw buffaloes dive beneath the floodwater to nibble grass.
sentences.cn: 他看见水牛潜到水下逐食水草.

sentences.en: He started to nibble his biscuit.
I felt a nibble at the bait.
sentences.cn: 我感到(有鱼)轻咬一下饵.

sentences.en: I felt a nibble on the end of my line.
sentences.cn: 我觉得有鱼轻轻地咬钩.

sentences.en: Inflation began to nibble away at their savings.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀开始蚕食他们的存款.

sentences.en: Instead of snacking on crisps and chocolate, nibble on celery or carrot.
sentences.cn: 不要把薯片和巧克力当零食来吃，要吃些芹菜和胡萝卜。

sentences.en: Nibble the backs of your partner's knees and legs.
sentences.cn: 轻轻撕咬爱人的膝盖以及腿的后部.

sentences.en: She sat down to nibble candy.
sentences.cn: 她坐下来,慢慢地吃着糖果.

sentences.en: The birds cling to the wall and nibble at the brickwork.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿们紧贴在墙上，啄着砖缝。

sentences.en: Then they would sit down to nibble on the cheese.
sentences.cn: 然后他们才会坐下来咀嚼奶酪.

sentences.en: When guests are drinking and have nothing to nibble.
sentences.cn: 客人得到的帐单是湿而有污迹.

words.tran_cn: 细咬；一点一点地咬；吹毛求疵

phrases.tran_cn: 一点一点地咬；吹毛求疵；啃

trans.tran_cn: 轻咬，显出有兴趣，很少量食物
一点点地咬， 慢慢啃
trans.tran_en: to eat small amounts of food by taking very small bites

trans.tran_cn: 慢慢减少，小口咬，（对提议、建议等）显出略有兴趣的样子，表示对…稍感兴趣
啃出（洞），一点一点咬出（洞）
